patthana15.12:4.1: Nahetuṃ parittaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nanahetu naparitto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā ….
patthana15.12:5.1: Hetuṃ mahaggataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu namahaggato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā ….
patthana15.12:6.1: Hetuṃ appamāṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu naappamāṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā ….
